get.summary: GetMerchants returns a list of merchants the user has access to

post.summary:
CreateMerchant creates a merchant in the database and returns the object
back with populated data

get.summary: GetProviders returns all providers that the user has access to

post.summary: CreateProvider creates a provider for the particular merchant

get.summary: Loads all items from given inventory.

post.summary: Adds an inventory item into the inventory of a merchant.

put.summary: Updates data stored in inventory Firestore collection

get.summary: Returns all products assigned to a particular merchant

parameters.name: merchantId
parameters.description: Required. Id of the merchant to which the product is assigned

post.summary: CreateProduct creates a product in the firestore for a particular merchant

parameters.name: merchantId
parameters.description: Required. Id of the merchant to which the product is assigned

put.summary: UpdateProduct updates a product in the firestore for a particular merchant

parameters.name: merchantId
parameters.description: Required. Id of the merchant to which the product is assigned

get.summary: Loads single product from a given merchant

parameters.name: merchantId
parameters.description: Required. Id of the merchant to which the product is assigned

get.summary: UpdateOrder update an attributes in order

post.summary: CreateOrder creates an order for the particular user in the store
CreateProductSchema creates the product schema in the system

CreateProductSchemaDry validates provided product schema and returns a list
of errors or the product schema on success

get.summary: Loads all stores from given merchant

post.summary:
Create store creates the store for the particular merchant and returns
the store object back to the caller

put.summary:
Update store creates the store for the particular merchant and returns
the store object back to the caller

get.summary: Loads single store from a given merchant

post.summary:
CreateStoreDry runs validation on the server side and returns
errors that need to be corrected to successfully create the store
for the particular merchant
CreateUpload creates an upload link for the merchant gallery

get.summary: GetUsers returns all users present in the merchant

parameters.name: merchantId
parameters.description: [Required] merchant_id can be set only once and is unchangeable during lifetime

parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
[Required] name of the merchant can be customized by the user, however, the id
will stay unchanged.

post.summary:
InviteUser creates a user account for the user in case it didn't exist before.
Otherwise it invites the user into the merchant

InviteUserDry validates the provided user for existence. correct email,
and other required fields by user invitation process

CreateMerchantDry runs validation on the server side and returns
errors that need to be corrected to successfully create the merchant
CreateCustomer creates a customer for the particular merchant

put.summary: GetCustomers returns all customers that the user has access to

v1AddInventoryItemRequest.description: Request for adding product items within inventory.

v1Amount.title: Message representing a value of something in a particular currency

itemSchema.title:
Schema of a array item
Could be of any type

default.title: Default value of the floating point number

minimum.title: Minimum float value, defaults to negative infinity

maximum.title: Maximum float value, defaults to positive infinity

enum.title: Array of possible values for the property

minimum.title: Minimum integer value, defaults to negative infinity

maximum.title: Maximum integer value, defaults to positive infinity

enum.title: Array of possible values for the property

title.title: Name or a short description of the object

customId.title:
Custom globally unique identifier
Unset by default but can be set and used as a reference to the element of the content model

comment.title: Comment left by the content modeler

regex.title: Regular expression that defines a language to which the value of this property must belong

enum.title: Array of possible values for the property

previousVersionId.title: ID of the previous content model version

nextVersionId.title: ID of the newer content model version

merchantId.title: Required. Id of the merchant to which the product is assigned

attributes.title: attributes are custom key-value pairs provided for the product

v1CreateStoreRequest.title: Request for create store in Firestore database

v1Expression.title: Message representing an expression to be used especially in filter operations

merchantId.title: [Required] merchant_id can be set only once and is unchangeable during lifetime

name.title:
[Required] name of the merchant can be customized by the user, however, the id
will stay unchanged

attributes.title: attributes are custom key-value pairs provided for the product

createdBy.title: createdBy is a reference to the user that created this product schema

attributes.title: attributes are custom key-value pairs provided for the product

v1RepeatedString.title: List of strings for use in oneofs

v1UpdateInventoryItemRequest.description: Request for updating product items within inventory.

merchantId.title: Required. Id of the merchant to which the product is assigned

attributes.title: attributes are custom key-value pairs provided for the product

v1UpdateStoreRequest.title: Request for update store in Firestore database

fileName.title: [Required] fileName is searchable throughout the system

link.title: [Output Only] this is being provided by the system after the file is uploaded

invitedById.title: id of the user this user was invited by into the system
